description: This file initializes safe handling of React environment variables in a Create React App (CRA) setup. It ensures that accessing environment variables starting with REACT_APP_* does not cause runtime crashes due to undefined values, providing default empty strings or a default port value.

methods.name: initEnvDefaults
methods.description: An immediately invoked function expression (IIFE) that sets default values for specific REACT_APP_* environment variables to prevent runtime errors in CRA applications.
